(girl next door + full service + less than $$ or TO) Redheads or Blondes a plus. I don't mind seedy if the girl is a cutie. Posted 4 years ago #|--> | #Reply MojoMan Inactive Skip Birmingham. Try Huntsville Originally Posted by Vanquish Might be heading up to B'ham from Montgomery on Saturday. Never been to the sc's there. Where can I find the holy grail? (girl next door + full service + less than $$ or TO) Redheads or Blondes a plus. I don't mind seedy if the girl is a cutie. I've only been to Bham SC's a few times, so I can't be certain, but I'm pretty sure what you're looking for is not easily available in Birmingham. And I've read nothing on this board to suggest otherwise. If you're willing to go a couple of hours north to Huntsville, and do a little reading, I think you'll find some entertainment. A club called Fantasia was a fun place, but I haven't seen anything on the Huntsville board about that place since there was a stabbing and accidental shooting there in late September. Doesn't mean it's closed or no longer a good place, just that there's been no info. I was there back in March and was well-entertained and stayed well within budget. Posted 9 years ago #|--> | #Reply Wanted Inactive Originally Posted by TheShadow2 highly unlikely. Where did you hear that? And actually, why would that be a violation that would close a place down? They don't serve alcohol, or sell adult goods there. Just doesn't seem likely. It could have been an hours violation. Minors are only allowed to work a certain number of hours per day/per week, and are not allowed to work past a certain time at night. In most states, it's 9 pm. Not sure about Illinois. That being said, I'd agree it seems a little far-fetched. There are usually only old hags working there. Posted 4 years ago #|--> | #Reply Myntz00 Inactive Originally Posted by John Newbie [View Original Post] Yes and no. Anyone can give a massage and charge for the service. They just can't advertise it as therapudic. No state license required. Only a licensed massage "therapist" can advertise a therapeutic massage. I had an ex in massage school. But, anytime you offer services of any kind in exchange for money, it is taxable income and needs to be accompanied by a business license if the city, county or state requires it outside of 1099 taxable income. A company or individual that pays less than $600 to one person as an independent contractor is not required to file a 1099 MISC with the IRS. Thus the IRS may not have a direct means of determining that the recipient received such an amount. If you as an independent contractor received $1 and your total income from that activity exceeded $399 you would need to file a tax return. Posted 5 years ago #|--> | #Reply Clark Kent Inactive SW Guide updated, to start thread Here's the post of my SW locations I posted elsewhere for those not familiar with the area. Since this is a new SW thread this might be a good way to start it for those who are passing through and might not see the post below. I'm also updating it with current names of places and so forth which I know have changed since my last post. Anyone not familiar with the area might need a map to get to some places, but this should help. I've been dating SW's in the B'ham area since the early 90's. They all change, come and go, disappear and reappear, but the places where they are mainly stay the same. In this list I won't talk about specific SW, just where you might find SW. Some of these places are remote, and chances are there won't be any SW there if you went to them, but they're places where I, or others have seen SW in the past. Some of the SW know places on every side of town to go and you may see one near Legion Field one day, then the next day she's in Woodlawn. And times that SW are out vary, though in most places I'll mention you could drive through there any time of the day and see one, and its possible you might not. As I've said many times before SW are only going to be out if they need money or dope, and if they have either you won't see them out until their supply is exhausted. If you're visiting the city and only have a short time, then the ones to pay attention to below are numbers 4, 6, 7, 9 & 11, which will be your best shot at finding SWs. The main area discussed in the General Reports as of late is number 4. 1) Starting on the east side of the B'ham area, theres a road off of Highway 75 heading toward Oneonta right past the Blount County line called Old Highway 75. Its just a road that goes in and a mile down the road comes back out. It's an area that blacks live and also is a well known crack area. SW's frequent there sometimes, but I haven't seen them the last few times I was by and haven't been by there lately. 2) There have been SW known to walk down Center Point Road as well from where Center Point begins all the way to the end of the road, theres been less frequency of that since they got tougher on that type of stuff in that area. 3) In the Leeds/Trussville area, there's a road off of Highway 78 heading to Leeds from Irondale called Floyd Bradford Road. About 3 miles down that road theres an area called Lola City where its a well know drug peddling area. Off of F.B. Road to the left is a one block dead end road called Virginia Street and SW are known to frequent there sometimes. Also, two blocks down from there, if you turn up the second left past that there's a road called High Street. That's also known drug area, and SW frequent there as well. These areas are not always good to find SW, but it is possible. 4) The 1st Avenue North area, going west from the Anchor Motel near the Krispy Kreme all the way down to the Crown gas station around 45th Street is always an area where SW pop up. Areas along that road where SW usually frequent are the adult book stores accross from the Church's chicken, the area around the Marathon and Conoco gas stations near 68th Street. Also the area in the main Woodlawn area is always cropping with SW, especially around the McDonalds in the 3 motels (Sky, American, Relax) surrounding it and in the streets around there, too. Then down the road there's a Motel 8 all alone at 50th Street, that area has alot of SW that frequent that area, too. 50th Street is also a road to check. There's also been a few TS that have shown up around the adult book stores on 1st, so make sure what you're getting. In Avondale near there, 3rd Avenue from the Exxon station to the Star Inn, and the streets behind the Star are areas to check. All of these areas have equal number of white and black SW. Always an area that needs to be checked. 5) Downtown theres always the faithful 4th Avenue North and 5th Avenue North around the post office that SW frequent at all hours, though not as prevalent as before they passed the hooker laws of course, but still there. I found a girl I went to high school with that was a cheerleader down there trying to pick up dates (she got hooked on pain killers), so you never know who you'll find. The SW usually are at the small mini park across from the post office, though the ones available usually look worn out. Also downtown, the area around the 16th Street Church and Kelly Ingram Park have been active with all kinds of girls walking around at all hours, also worth checking out. If in that area, I'd also ride by Linn Park, that's usually where the transients sleep, and there's alot of female transients who're always looking to make money. 6) Around the west side of town, if you travel down 3rd Avenue West from the Church's Chicken and Alabama Adult Books (around 9th Street and 3rd Ave west) all the way to where the fairgrounds area starts where Lomb Avenue intersects, theres always a chance you'll find a SW walking somewhere down that road. Though there have been SW further down heading towards Bessemer at a motel called Sun Inn. The side roads on either side of 3rd Avenue West are places to look too. Around that area, near Princeton Hospital and the Arlington House you can look in the areas around Tuscaloosa Avenue and Cotton Avenue from Elyton School down to Rallys. As well, you can go down 8th Avenue, from Arkadelphia Road all the way down to 16th Street and theres SW that frequent all areas down that road at all hours. There also used to be TS that walked down 8th Avenue between 5th Street past Parker H.S. and 12th Street, though I haven't seen them there in a long time. Mainly black SW around these areas, though occasionally theres a white SW every now and then. 7) Highway 78 heading toward Jasper, also called Arkadelphia Road, is another good area. Theres 2 truck stops right near one another, Pilot has a Wendys attached to it, and there's Kangaroo. SWs hang out in the parking lots alot and walk along the side of the road. Up the road from there, there's several motels, one near an overpass walkway and one called Alabama Motel. Finley Avenue also has a couple of truck stops around the I-65 exit, Conoco, Shell and Citgo, and those areas can have SWs hanging around. Around these truck stops theres usually equal numbers of white and black SWs. Going toward Jasper, I've also found a SW before walking down the highway in an area called Argo, next to a gas station on the side heading back toward B'ham. 8) There is activity at a motel on the Irondale/Birmingham border on Highway 78. It's called the USA Economy I believe. This place is also being watched and now has a security guard that walks around all the time. Be careful there, too. I've been told that the motel across from the Krystal in Irondale has had SWs there off and on, but the manager there isn't as casual about it as they are in Woodlawn. 9) Bessemer used to be active. There was info that the Scottish Inn down near Walmart has had SWs outside of it, though I have yet to see any. The Motel 8 on the west side of Bessemer heading toward B'ham is quite active there as well as the lots around the BP and Shell on 28th Street up the road. Also, side roads in Bessemer are always areas to look. If you're familiar with Bessemer, the areas around Snitz Snider Stadium at 4th Avenue and 9th Street, all the way back to Eastern Valley Road and all the areas in between are all places to look. Also look around Dartmouth Avenue on the eastern side of 150- there's some projects up the road that shows promise. You might want to watch out for Bessemer police, though, as they were out in force early morning the last time I passed through there. Heading back toward Birmingham on Bessemer Super Highway, there's two motels called the Hiway Host and the Ace Motel around the Lipscomb and Brighton areas to keep an eye on. Those two motels have been fairly active of late, though I'd watch the area as cops tend to hide where you can't see them until you're right upon them. 10) I've found girls around the fountain in southside. The fountain is on 20th St at the crossroads of 11th Avenue. I can't say for sure whether they're SW's or not, probably homeless or runaways just passing through. But those type usually are ones that could be up for a way to make some money, so it might be worth checking out. 11) East side of Birmingham - Richard Arrington Boulevard in Kingston and Woodlawn area. If you go down Arrington Blvd from the intersection of Messer Airport Hwy and head west toward town, basically before you get to Vanderbilt Road, there's always the possibility of finding SWs down this way. They're usually on the Kingston side, though on the weekends when the bars are open there's girls that hang out by the several bars right past 40th Street. Around Kingston, you'll usually tend to find rough looking black SWs. 12) Downtown Birmingham area - 12th Avenue North from 22nd to 32nd Streets. This stretch of road occasionally has SWs walking down that stretch, usually around the Rally's or down by the Shell and McDonalds. They can also be up in the neighborhoods as well, but it's hit and miss. Mainly miss. Low end SWs here, as well. Since this is a new SW thread this might be a good way to start it for those who are passing through and might not see the post below. I'm also updating it with current names of places and so forth which I know have changed since my last post. Anyone not familiar with the area might need a map to get to some places, but this should help. I've been dating SW's in the B'ham area since the early 90's. They all change, come and go, disappear and reappear, but the places where they are mainly stay the same. In this list I won't talk about specific SW, just where you might find SW. Some of these places are remote, and chances are there won't be any SW there if you went to them, but they're places where I, or others have seen SW in the past. Some of the SW know places on every side of town to go and you may see one near Legion Field one day, then the next day she's in Woodlawn. And times that SW are out vary, though in most places I'll mention you could drive through there any time of the day and see one, and its possible you might not. As I've said many times before SW are only going to be out if they need money or dope, and if they have either you won't see them out until their supply is exhausted. If you're visiting the city and only have a short time, then the ones to pay attention to below are numbers 4, 6, 7, 9 & 11, which will be your best shot at finding SWs. The main area discussed in the General Reports as of late is number 4. 1) Starting on the east side of the B'ham area, theres a road off of Highway 75 heading toward Oneonta right past the Blount County line called Old Highway 75. Its just a road that goes in and a mile down the road comes back out. It's an area that blacks live and also is a well known crack area. SW's frequent there sometimes, but I haven't seen them the last few times I was by and haven't been by there lately. 2) There have been SW known to walk down Center Point Road as well from where Center Point begins all the way to the end of the road, theres been less frequency of that since they got tougher on that type of stuff in that area. 3) In the Leeds/Trussville area, there's a road off of Highway 78 heading to Leeds from Irondale called Floyd Bradford Road. About 3 miles down that road theres an area called Lola City where its a well know drug peddling area. Off of F.B. Road to the left is a one block dead end road called Virginia Street and SW are known to frequent there sometimes. Also, two blocks down from there, if you turn up the second left past that there's a road called High Street. That's also known drug area, and SW frequent there as well. These areas are not always good to find SW, but it is possible. 4) The 1st Avenue North area, going west from the Anchor Motel near the Krispy Kreme all the way down to the Crown gas station around 45th Street is always an area where SW pop up. Areas along that road where SW usually frequent are the adult book stores accross from the Church's chicken, the area around the Marathon and Conoco gas stations near 68th Street. Also the area in the main Woodlawn area is always cropping with SW, especially around the McDonalds in the 3 motels (Sky, American, Relax) surrounding it and in the streets around there, too. Then down the road there's a Motel 8 all alone at 50th Street, that area has alot of SW that frequent that area, too. 50th Street is also a road to check. There's also been a few TS that have shown up around the adult book stores on 1st, so make sure what you're getting. In Avondale near there, 3rd Avenue from the Exxon station to the Star Inn, and the streets behind the Star are areas to check. All of these areas have equal number of white and black SW. Always an area that needs to be checked. 5) Downtown theres always the faithful 4th Avenue North and 5th Avenue North around the post office that SW frequent at all hours, though not as prevalent as before they passed the hooker laws of course, but still there. I found a girl I went to high school with that was a cheerleader down there trying to pick up dates (she got hooked on pain killers), so you never know who you'll find. The SW usually are at the small mini park across from the post office, though the ones available usually look worn out. Also downtown, the area around the 16th Street Church and Kelly Ingram Park have been active with all kinds of girls walking around at all hours, also worth checking out. If in that area, I'd also ride by Linn Park, that's usually where the transients sleep, and there's alot of female transients who're always looking to make money. 6) Around the west side of town, if you travel down 3rd Avenue West from the Church's Chicken and Alabama Adult Books (around 9th Street and 3rd Ave west) all the way to where the fairgrounds area starts where Lomb Avenue intersects, theres always a chance you'll find a SW walking somewhere down that road. Though there have been SW further down heading towards Bessemer at a motel called Sun Inn. The side roads on either side of 3rd Avenue West are places to look too. Around that area, near Princeton Hospital and the Arlington House you can look in the areas around Tuscaloosa Avenue and Cotton Avenue from Elyton School down to Rallys. As well, you can go down 8th Avenue, from Arkadelphia Road all the way down to 16th Street and theres SW that frequent all areas down that road at all hours. There also used to be TS that walked down 8th Avenue between 5th Street past Parker H.S. and 12th Street, though I haven't seen them there in a long time. Mainly black SW around these areas, though occasionally theres a white SW every now and then. 7) Highway 78 heading toward Jasper, also called Arkadelphia Road, is another good area. Theres 2 truck stops right near one another, Pilot has a Wendys attached to it, and there's Kangaroo. SWs hang out in the parking lots alot and walk along the side of the road. Up the road from there, there's several motels, one near an overpass walkway and one called Alabama Motel. Finley Avenue also has a couple of truck stops around the I-65 exit, Conoco, Shell and Citgo, and those areas can have SWs hanging around. Around these truck stops theres usually equal numbers of white and black SWs. Going toward Jasper, I've also found a SW before walking down the highway in an area called Argo, next to a gas station on the side heading back toward B'ham. 8) There is activity at a motel on the Irondale/Birmingham border on Highway 78. It's called the USA Economy I believe. This place is also being watched and now has a security guard that walks around all the time. Be careful there, too. I've been told that the motel across from the Krystal in Irondale has had SWs there off and on, but the manager there isn't as casual about it as they are in Woodlawn. 9) Bessemer used to be active. There was info that the Scottish Inn down near Walmart has had SWs outside of it, though I have yet to see any. The Motel 8 on the west side of Bessemer heading toward B'ham is quite active there as well as the lots around the BP and Shell on 28th Street up the road. Also, side roads in Bessemer are always areas to look. If you're familiar with Bessemer, the areas around Snitz Snider Stadium at 4th Avenue and 9th Street, all the way back to Eastern Valley Road and all the areas in between are all places to look. Also look around Dartmouth Avenue on the eastern side of 150- there's some projects up the road that shows promise. You might want to watch out for Bessemer police, though, as they were out in force early morning the last time I passed through there. Heading back toward Birmingham on Bessemer Super Highway, there's two motels called the Hiway Host and the Ace Motel around the Lipscomb and Brighton areas to keep an eye on. But those type usually are ones that could be up for a way to make some money, so it might be worth checking out. 11) East side of Birmingham - Richard Arrington Boulevard in Kingston and Woodlawn area. If you go down Arrington Blvd from the intersection of Messer Airport Hwy and head west toward town, basically before you get to Vanderbilt Road, there's always the possibility of finding SWs down this way. They're usually on the Kingston side, though on the weekends when the bars are open there's girls that hang out by the several bars right past 40th Street. Around Kingston, you'll usually tend to find rough looking black SWs. 12) Downtown Birmingham area - 12th Avenue North from 22nd to 32nd Streets. For one thing those places are not where they know to buy dope. The areas where they walk are all close by or in areas where drugs are sold, in the projects, run-down motels and drug infested neighborhoods right down the block from their stroll. There really are no other places for SW to go than their old standbys. They're not going to base their stroll far off and have to constantly be taken back to dope area to buy dope. They want to be a few blocks away at the most so they can call up such-and-such and have their baggie ready when they ride up or even be staying in the same motel as the dealer and just go to their room and pick it up. They're not going to go to areas that are not 'dope neighborhoods'. It's almost like the other areas won't tolerate it and snuffs it out before it even gets started. The areas they walk are around neighborhoods where the dope dealers live, and even if you drive the SWs and dealers off the street they're still in the area so they'll always be around. That's why when people ask if they've moved, if you think about it, where would they go ? The only answers to SW disappearing is if cops did a sweep and arrested the SW and dealers, or if they're just holed up inside their motel rooms and have enough repeat clientele that they don't even have to come out to the stroll.
